text:
**NEW EPISODE: PLEASE RT**
Why is there such distrust for the #COVID19 vaccine in the Black community? In the Season 2 premiere, we discuss the dark history of medicine, and how to build people's trust in science.

LISTEN: https://t.co/kWOD47Xai1

#COVID #Vaccine #BlackHistory https://t.co/yt8zMXpvY4
